titleStmt.title: The hunting of the hare; with her last will and testament. As 'twas performed on Bamstead Downes, by conny catchers, and their hounds. To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Text in black letter, printed in five columns.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
